chaosbib, you don't open the file, you have to extract it to a folder using winrar or 7zip, or some extracting/unzipping program. Look up WinRar on this site once you have winrar google how to extract a file to a folder using THAT program, then run the .exe folder and play. Don't install. If this doesn't work, and the game crashes, try that link Oreo commented. If it still doesn't work, there might be a problem with the file.
